General.Name: Pacific Empire Minerals Corp
General.Description: Pacific Empire Minerals Corp. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for copper, gold porphyry, molybdenum, and silver. Its flagship property is the Trident Project that covers an area of approximately 6,618 hectares located in the North-Central British Columbia. Pacific Empire Minerals Corp. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 525 Seymour Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 3H7

1.Name: Mr. Douglas Leigh Reed C.A., C.P.A., BSc, CA
